artist: Engraver: Cornelis Bloemaert; Artist: After Abraham Bloemaert
description: Virgin Mary seated with child on lap; clouds, small angels and halo of light surround image; circle of 8 stars around head
inscription:
Signature, and Inscription

in plate below image in black: [O fælix, quæ Virgo graris(?), gremiogé cubantem/ Foues Dwum dulciqé lactas vbere!/ Scandere te dignam mubes et cornua Lunæ/ Ludant Cherubim, colitgé Sol et Sydera/ A. Bloemaert/ Inventor(left of inscription)   (right of inscription)C. Bloem:Sculp:/et excud:A 102 5(in pencil)]; on mount lower right in pencil: [H 9 A B/ H (7)n C B]
title: Virgin Mary
